priority_fixes.issue: Missing EXT_DROP_DOWN rules for external dropdowns (Account Group, Country, Company Code)
priority_fixes.fix: Add EXT_DROP_DOWN rules with proper tableId and column mapping for Account Group/Vendor Type, Country, Company Code fields

priority_fixes.issue: VERIFY rule destinationIds contain -1 placeholder values
priority_fixes.fix: Map all ordinal positions (1st, 2nd, etc.) to actual field IDs. Remove -1 placeholders and ensure all PAN/GST response fields are properly mapped

priority_fixes.issue: Missing VALIDATION rules for field format validation
priority_fixes.fix: Add VALIDATION rules for: Mobile Number format, PAN format, GSTIN format, Email format, numeric-only fields

priority_fixes.issue: Missing CONVERT_TO rules for uppercase conversion
priority_fixes.fix: Add CONVERT_TO rules with value=UPPER_CASE for fields that require uppercase (PAN, GSTIN, etc.)

priority_fixes.issue: Missing OCR rules for additional image fields
priority_fixes.fix: Add OCR rules for: Cancelled Cheque Image, Address Proof Image, CIN Certificate, MSME Image

iteration_feedback: Iteration 8 generated 28 rules but reference has 172. Key gaps: missing EXT_DROP_DOWN (20 in ref), VALIDATION (18 in ref), CONVERT_TO (21 in ref), and COPY_TO (12 in ref) rules. OCR→VERIFY chains exist but VERIFY destinationIds have unmapped (-1) positions. Focus next iteration on: 1) External dropdown integration, 2) Field validation rules, 3) Complete ordinal mapping for VERIFY rules.
